----------------------------------------
Joomla\\CMS\\Form\\Field\\ModuletagField
----------------------------------------

.. php:namespace: Joomla\\CMS\\Form\\Field

.. php:class:: ModuletagField

    Module Tag field.

    .. php:attr:: type

        :type: string

        :scope: protected

        The form field type.

    .. php:method:: getOptions()

        Method to get the field options.

        :returns: array The field option objects.
